message.content: {"given_definition_quality":80,"better_definition":"a short time; in a little while","sentence":"我们一会儿走。","image_prompt":"Depict two people standing together, looking at each other, one gesturing that they will leave soon. Use a soft apocalypse animation style, muted colors, dreamy atmosphere, and subtle hints of gentle decay or surreal backgrounds, but keep the focus on the idea of 'leaving in a short while.' Make the scene warm and friendly.","sentence_translation":"We will leave in a little while."}
